changeSet.author: Siim Salla
changeSet.sql:
create table vehicles ( id bigserial not null, comoduleID varchar(50), identifier varchar(50), fleet varchar(255) not null, model varchar(255) not null, mileage bigserial, status varchar(255) not null, repo varchar(255) not null, ecuBranch varchar(255) not null, ecuCommit varchar(255) not null, csCommit varchar(255) not null, created_at timestamp default now() not null, updated_at timestamp default now() not null, deleted_at timestamp );
insert into vehicles (comoduleID, identifier, fleet, model, mileage, status, repo, ecuBranch, ecuCommit, csCommit) values ('TestSÃµiduk', 'ID122', 'Tallinn', 'VOK1', 0, 'Active', '123cefg', '123cefg', '123cefg', '123cefg')
